int32_t gaia::content::AssetInputStream::read ( ) [virtual]

Reads a single byte from this stream and returns it as an integer in the range from 0 to 255.

int32_t gaia::content::AssetInputStream::read ( const gaia::base::ByteArray &  buffer,
int32_t  offset,
int32_t  length 
) [virtual]

Reads at most length bytes from this stream and stores them in the byte array buffer starting at offset.

Parameters:
bufferThe byte array in which to store the bytes read.
offsetThe initial position in buffer to store the bytes read from this stream.
lengthThe maximum number of bytes to store in buffer.
Returns:
The number of bytes actually read or -1 if the end of the stream has been reached.

Reimplemented from gaia::storage::InputStream.

void gaia::content::AssetInputStream::reset ( ) [virtual]

Resets this stream to the last marked location.

Reimplemented from gaia::storage::InputStream.

int64_t gaia::content::AssetInputStream::skip ( int64_t  count) [virtual]

Skips at most count bytes in this stream.

This method does nothing and returns 0 if count is negative.

Parameters:
countThe number of bytes to skip.
Returns:
The number of bytes actually skipped.

Reimplemented from gaia::storage::InputStream.
